pages.text: To burn down more complex metals, like $(item)Tungsten$(), you are going to need to build yourself a $(item)Blast Furnace$(). It is a 3x3x3 multi-block structure. You are also going to need to make quite a lot of composite bricks for this.
Notice that cooking time of 30 seconds. You might need to make a few blast furnaces to make the process faster.
These are core building blocks of your $(item)Blast Furnace$(), which are also used to assemble the $(item)Blast Furnace Burner$()
